example.code: PS C:\> $policy = Get-LMPolicy -FunctionName "MylambdaFunction123" -Select Policy | ConvertFrom-Json| Select-Object -ExpandProperty Statement PS C:\> Remove-LMPermission -FunctionName "MylambdaFunction123" -StatementId $policy[0].Sid
example.description: This example removes the function policy for the specified StatementId of a Lambda Function.
